chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (a b : Term A n) (nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (p q r : list (Term A n)) (Cpxa : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)) (Cpxb : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q)), canonical A0 eqA ltM r -> eqP A eqA n (spolyf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) Cpxa Cpxb) (minuspf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (ppc A1 (n:=n) a b) b nZb r q) (spminusf A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec (ppc A1 (n:=n) a b) a nZa r p))

```coq
intros a b nZa nZb p q r Cpxa Cpxb Cpxr.
unfold eqP, spolyf, minuspf. simpl.
rewrite (ppc_monic _ _ a b nZa nZb p q r Cpxa Cpxb Cpxr).
rewrite (spminusf_ppc A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZa p Cpxa r).
rewrite (spminusf_ppc A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec b a nZb q Cpxb r).
reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros a b nZa nZb p q r Cpxa Cpxb Cpxr. unfold eqP, spolyf, minuspf. simpl. rewrite (ppc_monic _ _ a b nZa nZb p q r Cpxa Cpxb Cpxr). rewrite (spminusf_ppc A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a b nZa p Cpxa r). rewrite (spminusf_ppc A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec b a nZb q Cpxb r). reflexivity.
